Burma: Earliest evidence of Burmese alphabet (according to an 18th-century recast stone inscription)
China: Qiao Weiyo invented the canal pound lock.
Japan: The Ishinpō, the oldest surviving Japanese medical manual, is compiled.
Spain: Bermudo deposed Ramiro III and replaced him as king of León.
Sweden: Battle of Fyrisvellir near present day Uppsala; Swedish and Geat tribes unite for first time under Eric the Victorious
